title: WTB: Looking to Buy T206 HOF'ers
author: bmwntux

posts.post_title: WTB: Looking to Buy T206 HOF'ers
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following eight cards in PSA or SGC graded 3 to 5. Email me if you have any of these for sale:

Chance Red Portrait
Bender Portrait
McGraw with cap
Joss pitching
Evers with bat Cubs
M Brown Cubs shirt
Jennings both hands
Marquad throwing

[url]traderjohn1968@gmail.com[/url]

On a side note. Who has had enough of these buying/selling fees? Now Ebay collects sales tax in Illinois, something like 6.5% as of Jan 1st. The move is toward FB marketplace and boards like this one. Sellers and buyers are beginning to show up in droves. A tipping point is ahead. Enough already.

I’m with you sir.  I try to purchase on here, shows, or social media platforms. It’s best for both buyer and seller.
Sorry to derail but my tax starts Feb 1st. I love that net54 is a perfect option!
